review: I love my Chromecast. It was was very easy to set up the product and have it ready to cast and stream videos. Google Chrome makes it so easy. The price of the product is not bad either. You cannot get any of the other similar products like Roku or Apple TV anywhere close to this price. However, the downside is that it does not support all the streaming websites that those other products do. But I believe that Google is working to improve this product and make it even better. It needs time, I guess.

review: As of today I am finally ready to give the Chromecast 5 stars.Being able to use your phone as a controller is a rather neat idea and since almost everyone has smart phones it works out quite well. Set up is quick and easy, and using it with the apps on your phone is also easy.Up until today there was a severe lack of apps that could be used with it, which basically limited you to using netflix or hulu. But with the introduction of plex support, the chromecast has finally gotten to where I think it needs to be and you can finally stream local content. There are still quite a few more streaming services that need to be added (amazon instant video for one) but it is definitely getting better every day and is probably only a matter of time.For the price, and the features it now supports you really can't go wrong, and I honestly can't see myself purchasing any other streaming box anytime soon.
author: Amazon Customer
